title: Security Risks Introduced by Weak Authentication in Smart Home IoT Systems
summary: Smart home IoT systems rely on authentication mechanisms to ensure that only authorized entities can control devices and access sensitive functionality. In practice, these mechanisms must balance security with usability, often favoring persistent connectivity and minimal user interaction.
